sentences.en: Carlos Nusman presents medals to Lopes and Franco on podium.
sentences.cn: 卡洛斯·纽斯曼向站在奖台上的洛普斯和佛朗科颁发奖章.

sentences.en: I felt my legs trembling when I stepped onto the podium.
sentences.cn: 我走上讲台时觉得自己的腿在发抖.

sentences.en: It was a beautiful and emotional feeling on the podium.
sentences.cn: 在领奖台上的感觉很美好,也很情绪化.

sentences.en: Kimi, a winner here last year and three times on the podium.
sentences.cn: 问:基米, 冠军在去年的3倍在领奖台上.

sentences.en: Note: The athletes mount the podium to receive their medal.
sentences.cn: 注: 获奖运动员登上领奖台接受奖牌.

sentences.en: On the podium J ? Eric Humphrey stood impassively, waiting for the disapproving chorus to subside.
sentences.cn: 约? 埃里克?汉弗莱不动声色地站在指挥台上, 等着反对的喧嚣声消退.

sentences.en: Parliament speaker Ali Larijani was , however, seated on the podium.
sentences.cn: 但是议会议长阿里. 拉里贾尼 在台上就座.

sentences.en: Podium: In architecture, a pedestal on a large scale.
sentences.cn: 基座墙(台基): 建筑中规模很大的台座.

sentences.en: She walked up to the podium, just like a teacher.
sentences.cn: 她走上讲台, 俨然是个老师.

sentences.en: She was introduced and stepped up to the podium.
sentences.cn: 介绍完毕后她就登上讲台.

sentences.en: Standing here at the podium , I feel a great deal of responsibility.
sentences.cn: 当我走上这个讲坛的时候, 深感肩负责任之沉重.

sentences.en: The hotel is positioned above the western commercial podium.
sentences.cn: 酒店被安排在西边商务部之上.

sentences.en: The podium was flanked on both sides with flags of various countries.
sentences.cn: 颁奖台的两边插满了各国的旗子.

sentences.en: The winner a podium to receive gold, silver and bronze medals.
sentences.cn: 获奖者登上领奖台接受金牌 、 银牌和铜牌.

sentences.en: Unsteadily he mounted the podium, adjusted the microphone, coughed, and went completely blank.
sentences.cn: 他摇摇晃晃地走上讲台，调好麦克风，咳嗽了几声，接着脑子就一片空白。

sentences.en: Yes. So we put the podium onto the stage.
sentences.cn: 可以.那么将讲台摆到舞台上.

words.tran_cn: [交]乐队指挥台；矮墙；[建]墩座墙

trans.tran_cn: 表演台，讲台，乐队指挥台，领奖台
trans.tran_en: a small raised area for a performer, speaker, or musical  conductor  to stand on
